sqlMap.select: SELECT PLNAME AS name,SUM(1-STATUS) AS surplustotal FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(PL.NAME,'未分配') AS PLNAME, IFNULL(PL.ID,-1) AS PLID, PV.STATUS FROM ( SELECT PARKING_CODE, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(STATUS ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC,ID DESC),',',1) AS STATUS, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(CAMERA_IP ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC,ID DESC),',',1) AS CAMERA_IP, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(CREATE_TIME ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC,ID DESC),',',1) AS CREATE_TIME, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(PLATE_NO ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC,ID DESC),',',1) AS PLATE_NO, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(IN_TIME ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC,ID DESC),',',1) AS IN_TIME FROM T_PARKING_VIDEO GROUP BY PARKING_CODE ) PV INNER JOIN T_PARKING_GARAGE PG ON PG.CODE = PV.PARKING_CODE INNER JOIN T_PARKING_LOT PL ON PG.PARKING_LOT_CODE = PL.CODE WHERE PG.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.COMPANY_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#companyCode#,'%') ) SurplusTotal GROUP BY PLID,PLNAME ORDER BY PLID DESC

SELECT PT.$selectType$NAME AS name,INCAR.innum,OUTCAR.outnum FROM ( SELECT PL.NAME AS PLNAME,PL.ID AS PLID,PAS.NAME AS PASNAME,PAS.ID AS PASID FROM T_PARKING_LOT PL INNER JOIN T_PARKING_PASSAGES PAS ON PL.CODE=PAS.PARKING_LOT_CODE WHERE PAS.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.COMPANY_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#companyCode#,'%') ) PT
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) innum, $selectType$.ID AS $selectType$ID FROM T_PARKING_ORDER PO INNER JOIN T_PARKING_PASSAGES PAS ON PO.IN_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME=PAS.CODE INNER JOIN T_PARKING_LOT PL ON PL.CODE=PAS.PARKING_LOT_CODE WHERE PAS.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.COMPANY_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#companyCode#,'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(PO.IN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #startDate#
AND DATE_FORMAT(PO.IN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #endDate#
GROUP BY $selectType$.ID ) INCAR ON INCAR.$selectType$ID=PT.$selectType$ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) outnum, $selectType$.ID AS $selectType$ID FROM T_PARKING_ORDER PO INNER JOIN T_PARKING_PASSAGES PAS ON PO.OUT_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME=PAS.CODE INNER JOIN T_PARKING_LOT PL ON PL.CODE=PAS.PARKING_LOT_CODE WHERE PAS.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.IS_DELETE=0 AND PL.COMPANY_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#companyCode#,'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(PO.OUT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #startDate#
AND DATE_FORMAT(PO.OUT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #endDate#
GROUP BY $selectType$.ID ) OUTCAR ON OUTCAR.$selectType$ID=PT.$selectType$ID WHERE 1=1
AND PT.PLID=#selectId#
GROUP BY PT.$selectType$NAME,INCAR.innum,OUTCAR.outnum ORDER BY PT.$selectType$NAME

SELECT $selectType$ AS name, SUM(PO.YS_PAY_AMOUNT) AS yspayamount, SUM(PO.SS_PAY_AMOUNT) AS sspayamount FROM T_PARKING_ORDER PO INNER JOIN T_PARKING_PASSAGES PAS ON PO.OUT_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME = PAS. CODE INNER JOIN T_PARKING_LOT PL ON PL. CODE = PAS.PARKING_LOT_CODE WHERE PAS.IS_DELETE = 0 AND PL.IS_DELETE = 0 AND PL.COMPANY_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#companyCode#,'%')
AND PL.ID=#selectId#
AND LEFT(PO.PAY_TIME,10) >= #startDate#
AND LEFT(PO.PAY_TIME,10) <= #endDate#
GROUP BY $selectType$
